ConnectionStrings.DefaultConnection: Data Source=EARTH\EARTH; Initial Catalog=master; Integrated Security=False; User ID=Developer;Password=dev001$;

SqlQueries.Employees: SELECT Id, SystemName AS MachineName, Name, Birthday, ipv4 AS IpAddress, Mac AS MacAddress FROM DevelopBase.twt.Employee
SqlQueries.Users: SELECT usr.Id ,usr.MachineName ,usr.Name ,usr.Birthday ,usr.IpAddress FROM Development.TeamServices.vUsers AS usr
SqlQueries.Files: SELECT fls.Id ,fls.Name ,fls.Description ,fls.FileName FROM Development.TeamServices.vFiles AS fls
SqlQueries.Dictionary: SELECT dct.Id ,dct.Name ,dct.Description ,dct.SqlExpression FROM Development.TeamServices.vDictionary AS dct
